## Checklist

- [ ] Follows MVVM architecture
- [ ] Uses Signals for state
- [ ] No `any` types
- [ ] Uses design system tokens (no hardcoded colors)
- [ ] All tests pass (`npm test`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Coverage > 80%
- [ ] Build succeeds (`npm run build`)
- [ ] No console errors
- [ ] Documentation updated
